article_title: Letter Train wreck headed our way in November
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Some clouds and possibly an isolated thunderstorm this afternoon. High 87F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
